entries.description: SageMaker: Enable per-region manual filtering of Spaces
SageMaker: Show error message when connecting remotely from a remote workspace
SageMaker: Prompt user to use upgraded instance type if the chosen one has insufficient memory
Lambda upload from directory doesn't allow selection of directory
Toolkit fails to recognize it's logged in when editing Lambda function
SageMaker: Resolve race condition when reconnecting from multiple remote windows.
SageMaker: Resolve connection issues to SageMaker Spaces with capital letters in the name
SageMaker: Add support for deep-linked Space reconnection
Lambda Remote Debugging: Remote invoke configuration webview now supports attaching a debugger to directly debug your lambda function in the cloud.
SageMaker: Enable auto-shutdown support for Spaces
